sect2.para: Reads raw data values in binary format from the specified file. This file can be a file that was captured using a File Sink block, generated with a computer program or saved from an audio editor such as Audacity (using suitable RAW format options).
sect2.sect3:
File
Type: file_openSpecifies the input file name.

sect3.para: Specifies the data type of the output.
Selects whether to read through the file once or play it in a loop.

row.entry: When the end of file is reached, loop back to the beginning of the file and continue.
Read through the data until the end of file is reached.

sect2.sect3:
Vec Length
Type: intSpecifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
